---
title: Wikiapp docs
---

Welcome to the documentation for Wikiapp! We are so glad you are here.

This library will let you get random wikipedia page excerpts, in any language.

Yeah we know it doesnot do much! But it is a start.

```
> wikiapp -l es
São Pedro de Penaferrim
São Pedro de Penaferrim era una freguesia portuguesa del municipio de
Sintra, distrito de Lisboa.

```
